comments:
Using Eclipse 3.3 M7.

When I re-launched Eclipse, the "Update Site Map" editor on site.xml was open from my previous session, and I found this in the .log file:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 2 0 2007-05-29 16:23:17.192
!MESSAGE Ignored reentrant call while viewer is busy. This is only logged once per viewer instance, but similar calls will still be ignored.
